entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
